long_description: Lightweight, breathable and comfortable, the Vasque Breeze 2.0 hiking boots are a great choice for trail adventures. Mid-height uppers boast resilient 2mm thick nubuck leather and airy nylon mesh panels to supply rugged, flexible and lightweight performance. Gusseted, padded tongues keep out trail debris and relieve pressure from lacing across insteps. Wicking nylon mesh linings absorb excess moisture and disperse it for fast drying. Dual-density EVA footbeds and molded EVA midsoles absorb shock, provide cushioning and return energy back to feet for all-day comfort. Thermoplastic urethane plates embedded in the midsoles enhance stability and support. Aggressive Vibram Contact rubber outsoles on these Vasque Breeze 2.0 hiking boots supply stability and traction on demanding terrain.
short_description: Lightweight, breathable and comfortable, the Vasque Breeze 2.0 hiking boots are a great choice for trail adventures.
